chore.heading: Car from Garage
chore.description: Pick up car from the service centre near the highway and renew the insurance as well.

chore.heading: Project Deadline
chore.description: Submit the project in time before the deadline with proper documnet fromatting.

chore.heading: Start reading books
chore.description: Buy non-fiction books from store and read them atleast 30 minutes a day, starting today.
